proposal: Navigating to "pevetoken.com" might have hit a snag, but with 259 holders on the ETH network, it's clear your community knows how to hold tight! 🚀 Let's enhance that grip with our DEX and Lottery tools, turning every holder into a potential deployer. Imagine the possibilities when your token isn't just held but actively powers a community-driven ecosystem. Ready to bridge the gap from holding to creating?
